Sentencas: An integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-internal combustion engine (ICE) system was proposed in this paper.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: Methanol was used as the fuel in the system, meaning that the SOFC exhaust gas could not enter the engine with methanol, due to the high-injection pressure of fuel in engine and difficulty of pressurizing SOFC exhaust gas.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: Therefore, this paper proposed SOFC exhaust gas was delivered with engine intake air to achieve waste gas reutilization, which could also reduce oxygen concentration and increase specific heat capacity of in-cylinder gas for low NOx emissions.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: Two modes were proposed, including delivering SOFC anode-off gas into engine for Tier II requirements and delivering SOFC cathode and anode off gas into engine for Tier III requirements.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: The effects of power ratio of SOFC and engine on proposed system were analyzed based on the electrochemical model of SOFC and filling and emptying model of engine.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: The results indicated that increasing the power ratio in both modes led to an increase in brake power but a decrease in indicated efficiency, mainly due to the increase in energy input and the decrease in exergy-to-power conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: In addition, at Tier III mode, the Tier III requirements (weighted average NOx was 3.35 g/kWh) were met at power ratio of around 1:2, at which the energy and exergy efficiency of system reached 55.6% and 57.9%.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: Furthermore, an improvement for a tanker was proposed, substituting proposed system for combination of marine engine and diesel genset.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: Specifically, SOFC and ICE were used for auxiliary power unit and propulsion, respectively.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: The results showed that it could achieve better carbon-emission and techno-economic performances.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application

Sentencas: The payment period of such improvement was 3.08 years taking carbon trading and government support into account.
Titulo: Assessment of a methanol-fueled integrated hybrid power system of solid oxide fuel cell and low-speed two-stroke engine for maritime application
